member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.CloudTtsReflection
member.summary: Holder for reflection information generated from google/cloud/texttospeech/v1/cloud_tts.proto

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.CloudTtsReflection.Descriptor
member.summary: File descriptor for google/cloud/texttospeech/v1/cloud_tts.proto

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SsmlVoiceGender
member.summary: Gender of the voice as described in [SSML voice element](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/#edef_voice).

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SsmlVoiceGender.Unspecified
member.summary: An unspecified gender. In VoiceSelectionParams, this means that the client doesn't care which gender the selected voice will have. In the Voice field of ListVoicesResponse, this may mean that the voice doesn't fit any of the other categories in this enum, or that the gender of the voice isn't known.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SsmlVoiceGender.Male
member.summary: A male voice.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SsmlVoiceGender.Female
member.summary: A female voice.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SsmlVoiceGender.Neutral
member.summary: A gender-neutral voice.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioEncoding
member.summary: Configuration to set up audio encoder. The encoding determines the output audio format that we'd like.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioEncoding.Unspecified
member.summary: Not specified. Will return result [google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT][].

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioEncoding.Linear16
member.summary: Uncompressed 16-bit signed little-endian samples (Linear PCM). Audio content returned as LINEAR16 also contains a WAV header.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioEncoding.Mp3
member.summary: MP3 audio.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioEncoding.OggOpus
member.summary: Opus encoded audio wrapped in an ogg container. The result will be a file which can be played natively on Android, and in browsers (at least Chrome and Firefox). The quality of the encoding is considerably higher than MP3 while using approximately the same bitrate.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.ListVoicesRequest
member.summary: The top-level message sent by the client for the `ListVoices` method.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.ListVoicesRequest.LanguageCodeFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "language_code" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.ListVoicesRequest.LanguageCode
member.summary: Optional (but recommended) [BCP-47](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt) language tag. If specified, the ListVoices call will only return voices that can be used to synthesize this language_code. E.g. when specifying "en-NZ", you will get supported "en-*" voices; when specifying "no", you will get supported "no-*" (Norwegian) and "nb-*" (Norwegian Bokmal) voices; specifying "zh" will also get supported "cmn-*" voices; specifying "zh-hk" will also get supported "yue-*" voices.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.ListVoicesResponse
member.summary: The message returned to the client by the `ListVoices` method.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.ListVoicesResponse.VoicesFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "voices" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.ListVoicesResponse.Voices
member.summary: The list of voices.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice
member.summary: Description of a voice supported by the TTS service.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice.LanguageCodesFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "language_codes" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice.LanguageCodes
member.summary: The languages that this voice supports, expressed as [BCP-47](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt) language tags (e.g. "en-US", "es-419", "cmn-tw").

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice.NameFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "name" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice.Name
member.summary: The name of this voice. Each distinct voice has a unique name.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice.SsmlGenderFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "ssml_gender" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice.SsmlGender
member.summary: The gender of this voice.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice.NaturalSampleRateHertzFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "natural_sample_rate_hertz" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.Voice.NaturalSampleRateHertz
member.summary: The natural sample rate (in hertz) for this voice.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechRequest
member.summary: The top-level message sent by the client for the `SynthesizeSpeech` method.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechRequest.InputFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "input" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechRequest.Input
member.summary: Required. The Synthesizer requires either plain text or SSML as input.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechRequest.VoiceFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "voice" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechRequest.Voice
member.summary: Required. The desired voice of the synthesized audio.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechRequest.AudioConfigFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "audio_config" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechRequest.AudioConfig
member.summary: Required. The configuration of the synthesized audio.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesisInput
member.summary: Contains text input to be synthesized. Either `text` or `ssml` must be supplied. Supplying both or neither returns [google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT][]. The input size is limited to 5000 characters.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesisInput.TextFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "text" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesisInput.Text
member.summary: The raw text to be synthesized.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesisInput.SsmlFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "ssml" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesisInput.Ssml
member.summary: The SSML document to be synthesized. The SSML document must be valid and well-formed. Otherwise the RPC will fail and return [google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT][]. For more information, see [SSML](/speech/text-to-speech/docs/ssml).

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesisInput.InputSourceOneofCase
member.summary: Enum of possible cases for the "input_source" oneof.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.VoiceSelectionParams
member.summary: Description of which voice to use for a synthesis request.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.VoiceSelectionParams.LanguageCodeFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "language_code" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.VoiceSelectionParams.LanguageCode
member.summary: The language (and optionally also the region) of the voice expressed as a [BCP-47](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt) language tag, e.g. "en-US". Required. This should not include a script tag (e.g. use "cmn-cn" rather than "cmn-Hant-cn"), because the script will be inferred from the input provided in the SynthesisInput. The TTS service will use this parameter to help choose an appropriate voice. Note that the TTS service may choose a voice with a slightly different language code than the one selected; it may substitute a different region (e.g. using en-US rather than en-CA if there isn't a Canadian voice available), or even a different language, e.g. using "nb" (Norwegian Bokmal) instead of "no" (Norwegian)".

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.VoiceSelectionParams.NameFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "name" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.VoiceSelectionParams.Name
member.summary: The name of the voice. Optional; if not set, the service will choose a voice based on the other parameters such as language_code and gender.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.VoiceSelectionParams.SsmlGenderFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "ssml_gender" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.VoiceSelectionParams.SsmlGender
member.summary: The preferred gender of the voice. Optional; if not set, the service will choose a voice based on the other parameters such as language_code and name. Note that this is only a preference, not requirement; if a voice of the appropriate gender is not available, the synthesizer should substitute a voice with a different gender rather than failing the request.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig
member.summary: Description of audio data to be synthesized.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.AudioEncodingFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "audio_encoding" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.AudioEncoding
member.summary: Required. The format of the requested audio byte stream.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.SpeakingRateFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "speaking_rate" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.SpeakingRate
member.summary: Optional speaking rate/speed, in the range [0.25, 4.0]. 1.0 is the normal native speed supported by the specific voice. 2.0 is twice as fast, and 0.5 is half as fast. If unset(0.0), defaults to the native 1.0 speed. Any other values < 0.25 or > 4.0 will return an error.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.PitchFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "pitch" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.Pitch
member.summary: Optional speaking pitch, in the range [-20.0, 20.0]. 20 means increase 20 semitones from the original pitch. -20 means decrease 20 semitones from the original pitch.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.VolumeGainDbFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "volume_gain_db" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.VolumeGainDb
member.summary: Optional volume gain (in dB) of the normal native volume supported by the specific voice, in the range [-96.0, 16.0]. If unset, or set to a value of 0.0 (dB), will play at normal native signal amplitude. A value of -6.0 (dB) will play at approximately half the amplitude of the normal native signal amplitude. A value of +6.0 (dB) will play at approximately twice the amplitude of the normal native signal amplitude. Strongly recommend not to exceed +10 (dB) as there's usually no effective increase in loudness for any value greater than that.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.SampleRateHertzFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "sample_rate_hertz" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.SampleRateHertz
member.summary: The synthesis sample rate (in hertz) for this audio. Optional. If this is different from the voice's natural sample rate, then the synthesizer will honor this request by converting to the desired sample rate (which might result in worse audio quality), unless the specified sample rate is not supported for the encoding chosen, in which case it will fail the request and return [google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT][].

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.EffectsProfileIdFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "effects_profile_id" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.AudioConfig.EffectsProfileId
member.summary:
An identifier which selects 'audio effects' profiles that are applied on (post synthesized) text to speech. Effects are applied on top of each other in the order they are given. See
[audio-profiles](https: //cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/audio-profiles) for current supported profile ids.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechResponse
member.summary: The message returned to the client by the `SynthesizeSpeech` method.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechResponse.AudioContentFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "audio_content" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.SynthesizeSpeechResponse.AudioContent
member.summary: The audio data bytes encoded as specified in the request, including the header (For LINEAR16 audio, we include the WAV header). Note: as with all bytes fields, protobuffers use a pure binary representation, whereas JSON representations use base64.

member.summary: The filter specifying which RPC s are eligible for retry for "Idempotent" RPC methods.
member.remarks: The eligible RPC s for retry for "Idempotent" RPC methods are:

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.TextToSpeechSettings.NonIdempotentRetryFilter
member.summary: The filter specifying which RPC s are eligible for retry for "NonIdempotent" RPC methods.
member.remarks: There are no RPC s eligible for retry for "NonIdempotent" RPC methods.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.TextToSpeechSettings.GetDefaultRetryBackoff
member.summary: "Default" retry backoff for RPC methods.
member.returns: The "Default" retry backoff for RPC methods.
member.remarks:
The "Default" retry backoff for RPC methods is defined as:
Initial delay: 100 milliseconds
Maximum delay: 60000 milliseconds
Delay multiplier: 1.3

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.TextToSpeechSettings.GetDefaultTimeoutBackoff
member.summary: "Default" timeout backoff for RPC methods.
member.returns: The "Default" timeout backoff for RPC methods.
member.remarks:
The "Default" timeout backoff for RPC methods is defined as:
Initial timeout: 20000 milliseconds
Timeout multiplier: 1.0
Maximum timeout: 20000 milliseconds

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.TextToSpeechSettings.ListVoicesSettings
member.summary: for synchronous and asynchronous calls to TextToSpeechClient.ListVoices and TextToSpeechClient.ListVoicesAsync.
member.remarks:
The default TextToSpeechClient.ListVoices and TextToSpeechClient.ListVoicesAsync are:
Initial retry delay: 100 milliseconds
Retry delay multiplier: 1.3
Retry maximum delay: 60000 milliseconds
Initial timeout: 20000 milliseconds
Timeout multiplier: 1.0
Timeout maximum delay: 20000 milliseconds
Retry will be attempted on the following response status codes:
Default RPC expiration is 600000 milliseconds.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.TextToSpeechSettings.SynthesizeSpeechSettings

member.remarks:
The default TextToSpeechClient.SynthesizeSpeech and TextToSpeechClient.SynthesizeSpeechAsync are:
Initial retry delay: 100 milliseconds
Retry delay multiplier: 1.3
Retry maximum delay: 60000 milliseconds
Initial timeout: 20000 milliseconds
Timeout multiplier: 1.0
Timeout maximum delay: 20000 milliseconds
Retry will be attempted on the following response status codes:
Default RPC expiration is 600000 milliseconds.

member.summary: Shuts down any channels automatically created by and . Channels which weren't automatically created are not affected.
member.remarks: After calling this method, further calls to and will create new channels, which could in turn be shut down by another call to this method.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.TextToSpeechClient.ListVoicesAsync(System.String,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings)
member.summary: Returns a list of Voice supported for synthesis.
member.param: Optional (but recommended) [BCP-47](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt) language tag. If specified, the ListVoices call will only return voices that can be used to synthesize this language_code. E.g. when specifying "en-NZ", you will get supported "en-*" voices; when specifying "no", you will get supported "no-*" (Norwegian) and "nb-*" (Norwegian Bokmal) voices; specifying "zh" will also get supported "cmn-*" voices; specifying "zh-hk" will also get supported "yue-*" voices.
If not null, applies overrides to this RPC call.
member.returns: A Task containing the RPC response.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.TextToSpeechClient.ListVoicesAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a list of Voice supported for synthesis.
member.param: Optional (but recommended) [BCP-47](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt) language tag. If specified, the ListVoices call will only return voices that can be used to synthesize this language_code. E.g. when specifying "en-NZ", you will get supported "en-*" voices; when specifying "no", you will get supported "no-*" (Norwegian) and "nb-*" (Norwegian Bokmal) voices; specifying "zh" will also get supported "cmn-*" voices; specifying "zh-hk" will also get supported "yue-*" voices.
A to use for this RPC.
member.returns: A Task containing the RPC response.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.TextToSpeech.V1.TextToSpeechClient.ListVoices(System.String,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings)
member.summary: Returns a list of Voice supported for synthesis.
member.param: Optional (but recommended) [BCP-47](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt) language tag. If specified, the ListVoices call will only return voices that can be used to synthesize this language_code. E.g. when specifying "en-NZ", you will get supported "en-*" voices; when specifying "no", you will get supported "no-*" (Norwegian) and "nb-*" (Norwegian Bokmal) voices; specifying "zh" will also get supported "cmn-*" voices; specifying "zh-hk" will also get supported "yue-*" voices.
If not null, applies overrides to this RPC call.
member.returns: The RPC response.
